welcome_message_body: Welcome to Witten, a charming city known for its picturesque old town and beautiful natural surroundings. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that Witten has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dortmund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Dortmund Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Secondary terminal for domestic and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for low-cost and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal for long-haul and international flights.

wifi.note: Free for the first 30 minutes, then requires payment for longer use.
